EmailTemplate.name: IPM send email when project reactivated
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Project {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Project_Name__c} has been Reactivated
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Please note, Project {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Project_Name__c} has been reactivated by {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Business_Partner_User_Name__c} at {!DATEVALUE(IPM_Last_Modified_Date_Time__c)} on {!MID(TEXT(IPM_Last_Modified_Date_Time__c),12,5)}.
